entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shawinigan 6:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: NW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:52 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:52 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:52 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
